--- title: "Home Page" --- # メッシとクリロナのクラブゴールデータ分析の研究 # 研究目的 ●● ## 研究期間 2025年4月1日~2025年7月15日 ## 研究内容 ●● ## ## データ # メッシのクラブゴールデータ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d1 <- read.csv("./data/messi_data.csv") head(d1,10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Season Competition Matchday Date Venue Club 1 04/05 LaLiga 34 05-01/05 H FC Barcelona 2 05/06 UEFA Champions League Group Stage 11-02/05 H FC Barcelona 3 05/06 LaLiga 13 11/27/05 H FC Barcelona 4 05/06 LaLiga 19 1/15/06 H FC Barcelona 5 05/06 LaLiga 20 1/22/06 H FC Barcelona 6 05/06 LaLiga 21 1/29/06 A FC Barcelona 7 05/06 LaLiga 21 1/29/06 A FC Barcelona 8 05/06 Copa del Rey Quarter-Finals 02-01/06 H FC Barcelona 9 05/06 LaLiga 24 2/18/06 H FC Barcelona 10 06/07 LaLiga 1 8/28/06 A FC Barcelona Opponent Result Playing_Position Minute At_score 1 Albacete Balompie 2:00 CF 90+1 2:00 2 Panathinaikos Athens 5:00 RW 34 3:00 3 Racing Santander 4:01 RW 51 2:00 4 Athletic Bilbao 2:01 RW 50 2:01 5 Deportivo Alaves 2:00 CF 82 2:00 6 RCD Mallorca 0:03 CF 75 0:02 7 RCD Mallorca 0:03 CF 83 0:03 8 Real Zaragoza 2:01 CF 42 1:00 9 Real Betis Balompie 5:01 RW 84 5:01 10 Celta de Vigo 2:03 LW 59 1:02 Type Goal_assist 1 Left-footed shot Ronaldinho Gaacho 2 Left-footed shot 3 Left-footed shot Samuel Etoo 4 Left-footed shot Mark van Bommel 5 Left-footed shot Ronaldinho Gaacho 6 Right-footed shot Sylvinho 7 Left-footed shot Ronaldinho Gaacho 8 Header Ludovic Giuly 9 Left-footed shot 10 Left-footed shot Andres Iniesta ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(DT) d1 <- read.csv("./data/messi_data.csv") datatable(head(d1,10),options = list(autoWidth = TRUE)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # ロナウドのクラブゴールデータ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d2 <- read.csv("./data/cr7_data.csv") head(d2,10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Season Competition Matchday Date Venue 1 02/03 Liga Portugal 6 10-07-02 H 2 02/03 Liga Portugal 6 10-07-02 H 3 02/03 Liga Portugal 8 10/26/02 A 4 02/03 Taca de Portugal Placard Fourth Round 11/24/02 H 5 02/03 Taca de Portugal Placard Fifth Round 12/18/02 H 6 03/04 Premier League 11 11-01-03 H 7 03/04 FA Cup Fifth Round 2/14/04 H 8 03/04 Premier League 29 3/20/04 H 9 03/04 Premier League 32 04-10-04 A 10 03/04 Premier League 38 5/15/04 A Club Opponent Result Playing_Position Minute 1 Sporting CP Moreirense FC 3:00 LW 34 2 Sporting CP Moreirense FC 3:00 LW 90+5 3 Sporting CP Boavista FC 1:02 88 4 Sporting CP CD Estarreja 4:01 67 5 Sporting CP FC Oliveira do Hospital 8:01 13 6 Manchester United Portsmouth FC 3:00 RW 80 7 Manchester United Manchester City 4:02 RW 74 8 Manchester United Tottenham Hotspur 3:00 89 9 Manchester United Birmingham City 1:02 60 10 Manchester United Aston Villa 0:02 4 At_score Type Goal_assist 1 2:00 Solo run 2 3:00 Header Rui Jorge 3 1:02 Right-footed shot Carlos Martins 4 3:00 Left-footed shot Cesar Prates 5 3:00 6 2:00 Direct free kick 7 3:00 Right-footed shot 8 2:00 Right-footed shot 9 1:01 Header Ryan Giggs 10 0:01 Right-footed shot ``` ::: :::
